item.title: [Python] I tried Metaflow, an ML workflow tool developed by Netflix [Overview]
item.description: Netflix has released [Metaflow](https://metaflow.org), a Python library for managing machine learning workflows. With this, Data processing/model building process can be described in a uniform format, making it easy to follow the overall flow Version control of model and pretreatment process is possible Distributed processing is possible on AWS environment There are advantages such as. If you are curious, let’s go through the official documentationwhilerunningthetutorial. .. For Tutorial, after inserting the library with pip install metaflow,
